reviews.review: I greatly enjoy playing Counterstrike Source. However, since not many people are playing online anymore, I would not recommend this game unless you have friends. I also found Source to be required in order to play Trouble in Terrorist Town (TTT). All in all, I would recommend it if some people wanted to play it with you but if you have nobody willing to play with you then I would highly recommend Counterstrike Global Offensive instead. 8/10
this game is alot of fun ^_^

GO GO GO!!!! i got this game just for Gmod but i found out it was a very good multiplayer game

IM RELOADING!!!! i cant say much but still be amazed by Valve

76/100

A great game. Perfect for quick online shooting sessions or a LAN gathering. This is a solid FPS game that has persisted as a standard game in the genre for years.

Все мы знаем известный в народе шутер Counter Strike 1.6.Так вот,CSS(сокращённо от Counter Strike:Source)игра которая следует по канонам серии,немного исправив баги и сев на другой движок.Но CSS добавила экшена в серию.Например оружие AWP теперь прицеливается сразу после нажатия прицела,и теперь убивать стало сложнее.
It realy was a good game when everyone was still playing it. :)

A ver, empezemos con lo duro :V.
~>Negativo:
->Está hasta los cojones de hackers y toca pelotas.
->Servidores medianamente malos en tema de creación.
->¿Para que cojones quiero bots en los servidores._.?
~>Positivo:
->Personalización de armas awesome, con su carpeta "custom".
->Permite que los usuarios creen servidores con las diferentes opciones de hosting (Totalmente aparte del CS:S)
->Optimización muy buena y lograda.
Y nada más por ahora, si queréis tener armas bonitas :v y personalizadas con buen diseño, y pelear con guiris, rusos y más adelante es vuestro juego.
I like this game alot despite my short time playing it. It's important to get it also if you want the gmod textures
You haters are stupid this game may have bad graphics but the gameplay rocks!!!
I thin that this is the most Fun fps i have ever played and a strongly sugest it to all who want to have fun!
If You Own Steam, You Must Own This Game. XP XD

A game where you can play or destroy your friends in a one vs one style game. You can play in gamemodes with only sniper rifles or just knifes, playing Jailbreak by following order or do the opposite and try to steal weapons andget payback on those pesky guards.

This game is a pure classic! I've been playing Counter Strike for over a decade now, and over 3 accounts have logged over 20,000 hours. If you're looking for a game that has an insane amount of replayability this is it
Très bon FPS même si il commence à se faire ancien et dépasser par Counter Strike : Global Offensive
Very nice game, addictive, but nice, BUY IT.

I love this game.
-It had good graphics for the time, but has since been outdated
-The gameplay is super fun
-It isn't a CoD clone or a generic class-based shooter
But there are problems:
-I don't have a good computer, so CS:GO is laggy, and not many people play this game, so either i get lucky to play this, or deal with lag that throws off my aim.
-I feel like every server i join has theese uber pros. If there was matchmaking, I would be super happy. That is highly unlikley, since CS:GO has replaced this game


**QUICK NOTE: If you have GMOD, this is a MUST HAVE. Most of GMOD's Addons take textures completley from this game, making GMOD look like poop.**

Excellent jeux de la série des Counter Strike. Surement le meilleur ! CS:GO est bien aussi mais demande plus de capacité niveau PC. Très bon jeux, à acheter sans hésiter !
